data_version.description: (str) Used to refer to the data created in all the notebooks run

CSD_path.description: (str) Path to the file containing customer sales data

SFD_path.description: (str) Path to the file containing salesforce data

RSD_path.description: (str) Path to the file containing rental sales data

CWD_path.description: (str) Path to the file containing the crosswalk data

CBD_path.description: (str) Path to the file containing customer baseline data

EDD_path.description: (str) Path to the file containing external definitive data

CPL_path.description: (str) Path to the file containing the curated product list data

UPL_path.description: (str) Path to the file containing the unfiltered product list data

cutoff_date.description: (YYYY-MM-DD) The date used as a cutoff point for the analysis

run_customer_feature_wrapping.description: (bool) Flag indicating whether customer feature wrapping should be performed

customer_feature_wrapping_version.description: (str) The 'data_version' tag whoes feature wrapping result should be used

customer_top_feature.description: (int) The number of top customer features to select

run_customer_weight_tuning.description: (bool) Flag indicating whether customer weight tuning should be performed

customer_weight_tuning_version.description: (str) The 'data_version' tag whoes weight tuning result should be used

customer_weight_tuning_trials.description: (int) Number of trials to run for finding optimized set of weights

customer_clustering_cutoff_distance.description: (float) The cutoff point for the number of customer clusters to create

run_product_feature_wrapping.description: (bool) Flag indicating whether customer feature wrapping should be performed

product_feature_wrapping_version.description: (str) The 'data_version' tag whoes feature wrapping result should be used

product_top_feature.description: (int) The number of top customer features to select

run_product_weight_tuning.description: (bool) Flag indicating whether product weight tuning should be performed

product_weight_tuning_version.description: (str) The 'data_version' tag whoes weight tuning result should be used

product_weight_tuning_trials.description: (int) Number of trials to run for finding optimized set of weights

product_clustering_cutoff_distance.description: (float) The cutoff point for the number of product clusters to create

prediction_train_data_sampling.description: (str) Choose whether to use upsampled, downsampled or default train data set for prediction model

max_days_between_purchase.description: (int) The maximum number of days between consecutive purchases

near_sale_cutoff.description: (int) The threshold that determines whether the sale is near sale or far sale

propensity_train_data_sampling.description: (str) Choose whether to use upsampled, downsampled or default train data set for propensity model

matrix_model.description: (str) Name of the model that should be used for filling the collabrative matrix
